articles.description: A STUDENT got dress-coded at her university gym for allegedly showing “too much skin” but people think they’re just jealous she’s hot. Kedan Mack, a university student, shar…
articles.content:
A STUDENT got dress-coded at her university gym for allegedly showing "too much skin" but people think they're just jealous she's hot.
